verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2658>He<s%> came <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1191>Derbe<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G5100>a<s%> <S%G1135><s%> <S%G2453>Jewess<s%> who <S%G4103>believed;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> was a <S%G1672>Greek.<s%>
The <S%G80>brothers<s%> who <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium<s%> <S%G3739>gave<s%> a good <S%G3140>testimony<s%> about <S%G5259>him.<s%>

<S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2309>wanted<s%> to have <S%G5126>him<s%> go <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4059>circumcised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> who <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G1063>parts;<s%> for they <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G5225>was<s%> a <S%G1672>Greek.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>As<s%> they went on their way <S%G1279>through<s%> the <S%G4172>cities,<s%> they <S%G3860>delivered<s%> the <S%G1378>decrees<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> to <S%G5442>keep<s%> which had been <S%G2919>ordained<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> who <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767>So<s%> the <S%G1577>assemblies<s%> <S%G4732>were<s%> <S%G4732>strengthened<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4052>increased<s%> in <S%G706>number<s%> <S%G2250>daily.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> they had gone <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G5561>region<s%> of <S%G5435>Phrygia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1054>Galatia,<s%> they were <S%G2967>forbidden<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia.<s%>

<S%G2596>When<s%> they had <S%G2064>come<s%> opposite <S%G3465>Mysia,<s%> they <S%G3985>tried<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G2596>into<s%> <S%G978>Bithynia,<s%> <S%G2532>but<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1439>allow<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>
<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3928>Passing<s%> by <S%G3465>Mysia,<s%> they came <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5174>Troas.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> A <S%G3705>vision<s%> <S%G3700>appeared<s%> to <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1223>in<s%> the <S%G3571>night.<s%> There <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> of <S%G3110>Macedonia<s%> <S%G2476>standing,<s%> <S%G3870>begging<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Come <S%G1224>over<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> and <S%G997>help<s%> <S%G2254>us.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>When<s%> he had <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G3705>vision,<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> we <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G1831>go<s%> out <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G4822>concluding<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to preach the Good <S%G2097>News<s%> to <S%G846>them.<s%>

Setting <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5174>Troas,<s%> we made a straight <S%G2113>course<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4543>Samothrace,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> the day <S%G1966>following<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3496>Neapolis;<s%>

<S%G5037>and<s%> from <S%G1564>there<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> the <S%G4413>foremost<s%> of the <S%G3310>district,<s%> a Roman <S%G2862>colony.<s%> <S%G1161>We<s%> <S%G1510>were<s%> <S%G1304>staying<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4172>city.<s%>

On the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> we <S%G1831>went<s%> forth <S%G1854>outside<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> a <S%G4215>riverside,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> we <S%G3543>supposed<s%> there was a <S%G1511>place<s%> of <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> we sat <S%G2523>down,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to the <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> had come <S%G4905>together.<s%>

A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G3070>Lydia,<s%> a seller of <S%G4211>purple,<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G2363>Thyatira,<s%> one <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G4576>worshiped<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2588>us;<s%> whose heart the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1272>opened<s%> <S%G4337>to<s%> listen <S%G4337>to<s%> the things <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>When<s%> she <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3624>household<s%> were <S%G907>baptized,<s%> she <S%G3870>begged<s%> <S%G3004>us,<s%> saying, <S%G1487>"If<s%> you have <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> and <S%G3306>stay.<s%>" <S%G2532>So<s%> she <S%G3849>persuaded<s%> <S%G2248>us.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> It <S%G1096>happened,<s%> as <S%G2257>we<s%> were <S%G4198>going<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> that a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3814>girl<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4436>divination<s%> <S%G528>met<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3930>brought<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2962>masters<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2039>gain<s%> by fortune <S%G3132>telling.<s%>

<S%G3778><s%> <S%G2628>Following<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%> she <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G3004>out,<s%> <S%G3778>"These<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> of the Most <S%G5310>High<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> proclaim <S%G2605>to<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> a <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation!<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G4160>She<s%> was doing <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> becoming greatly <S%G1278>annoyed,<s%> <S%G1994>turned<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> "I <S%G3853>command<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to come <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>her!<s%>" <S%G2532>It<s%> came <S%G1831>out<s%> that <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2962>masters<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2039>gain<s%> was <S%G1831>gone,<s%> they <S%G1949>seized<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas,<s%> and <S%G1670>dragged<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G58>marketplace<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> the <S%G758>rulers.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> they had <S%G4317>brought<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to the <S%G4755>magistrates,<s%> they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3778>"These<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> are <S%G1613>agitating<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> set <S%G2605>forth<s%> <S%G1485>customs<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> it <S%G1832>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for <S%G2254>us<s%> to <S%G3858>accept<s%> <S%G3761>or<s%> to <S%G4160>observe,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G4514>Romans.<s%>"

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> rose up <S%G4911>together<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4755>magistrates<s%> tore <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>clothes<s%> <S%G4048>off<s%> of <S%G2753>them,<s%> and commanded them to be beaten with <S%G4463>rods.<s%>

<S%G5037>When<s%> they had <S%G2007>laid<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4127>stripes<s%> on <S%G846>them,<s%> they <S%G906>threw<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> <S%G3853>charging<s%> the <S%G1200>jailer<s%> to <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G806>safely,<s%>

<S%G3739>who,<s%> having <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G3852>command,<s%> <S%G906>threw<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2082>inner<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> <S%G2532%G99999>and<s%> <S%G805>secured<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3586>stocks.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2596>about<s%> <S%G3317>midnight<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> were <S%G4336>praying<s%> and singing <S%G5214>hymns<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoners<s%> were <S%G1874>listening<s%> to <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G869>Suddenly<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> the <S%G2310>foundations<s%> of the <S%G1201>prison<s%> were <S%G4531>shaken;<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2374>doors<s%> were <S%G455>opened,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>everyone<s%>'s <S%G1199>bonds<s%> were <S%G447>loosened.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G1200>jailer,<s%> being roused <S%G1096>out<s%> of <S%G1853>sleep<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> the <S%G1200>prison<s%> <S%G2374>doors<s%> <S%G455>open,<s%> <S%G4685>drew<s%> his <S%G3162>sword<s%> and <S%G3195>was<s%> about to <S%G337>kill<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> supposing <S%G3543>that<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoners<s%> had <S%G1628>escaped.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5455>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4238>"Don't<s%> <S%G3367><s%> <S%G2556>harm<s%> <S%G4572>yourself,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G1759>here!<s%>"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G154>called<s%> for <S%G5457>lights<s%> and sprang <S%G1530>in,<s%> <S%G2532>and,<s%> fell <S%G4363%G99999>down<s%> <S%G1790>trembling<s%> before <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4254>brought<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1854>out<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G2962>"Sirs,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G2443>be<s%> <S%G4982>saved?<s%>"

<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4100>"Believe<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> will be <S%G4982>saved,<s%> you <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3624>household.<s%>"

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3614>house.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> of the <S%G3571>night,<s%> and <S%G3068>washed<s%> <S%G575>their<s%> <S%G4127>stripes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G3916>immediately<s%> <S%G907>baptized,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G846>household.<s%>

<S%G5037>He<s%> <S%G321>brought<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> and <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G5132>food<s%> before <S%G3908>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G21>rejoiced<s%> <S%G3832>greatly,<s%> with all his household, having <S%G4100>believed<s%> in <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1096>when<s%> it was <S%G2250>day,<s%> the <S%G4755>magistrates<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> the <S%G4465>sergeants,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G630>"Let<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G630>go.<s%>"

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G1200>jailer<s%> <S%G518>reported<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3754>Paul,<s%> <S%G4755>saying,<s%> "The magistrates have <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> let you <S%G630>go;<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> come <S%G1831>out,<s%> and <S%G1831>go<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> "They have <S%G1194>beaten<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1219>publicly,<s%> without a <S%G178>trial,<s%> men who <S%G5225>are<s%> <S%G444>Romans,<s%> and have <S%G906>cast<s%> us <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison!<s%> <S%G2532>Do<s%> they <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1544>release<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1544><s%> <S%G2977>secretly?<s%> <S%G3756>No,<s%> most <S%G1063>certainly,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> let them <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%> and <S%G1806>bring<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1219>out!<s%>"

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G4465>sergeants<s%> <S%G312>reported<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> to the <S%G4755>magistrates,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G1526>were<s%> <S%G4514>Romans,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G3870>begged<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%> When they had <S%G1806>brought<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1806>out,<s%> they <S%G2065>asked<s%> them to <S%G1831>depart<s%> from the <S%G4172>city.<s%>

<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3070>Lydia<s%>'s <S%G2532>house.<s%> When they had <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> they <S%G3870>encouraged<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1831>departed.<s%>
